description.value:
You have learned to regain some of your magical energy by studying your spellbook. Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can recover used spell slots of your choice. Recovered spell slots can have a combined ring total equal to or less than half your wizard level (rounded up).

For example, if you’re a 4th-level wizard, you can recover up to two rings’ worth of spell slots. You can recover either a single 2nd-ring spell slot or two 1st-ring spell slots.
